summary: Verified UI layout standardization between Transformer Test Report and Equipment Service Reports (ACB, VCB). All three report types now have identical Report Information and Customer Information sections.
critical_code_review_comments: EquipmentServiceReport.js correctly has FileText icon in Report Information header (line 958)
Report Type 8 radio options are correctly placed INSIDE Report Information card in both files
Project Name (PID) dropdown uses correct fallback format: pid_no || PID-${id.slice(0,6).toUpperCase()}
Customer Information section has identical 8 fields in all three report types
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI layout standardization verified. VCB, ACB, and Transformer reports all have identical Report Information (with FileText icon, 8 Report Type radio options inside) and Customer Information (8 fields) sections.
